Class FootballerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.tomasz.walorski.controller.FootballerController

  • public class FootballerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class include methods ensuring, that input has proper type for Footballer Servlet.

    1.1
    Author:
    Tomasz Walorski

                                                                     java.lang.String clubNumber,
                                                                     java.lang.String birthDate,
                                                                     java.lang.String playingPosition,
                                                                     java.lang.String clubId)
        Method check if each input is correct for updating footballer.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of footballer object to update.
        fullName - Input string to update fullName field.
        clubNumber - Input string to update clubNumber field.
        birthDate - Input string to update birthDate field.
        playingPosition - Input string to update playingPosition field.
        clubId - Id of club to update clubId field.
        Returns:
        Method return error's messages list, if inputs have not proper type.

        clubNumber - Input string to set in clubNumber field.
        birthDate - Input string to set in birthDate field.

        clubId - Id of club to set in clubId field.
